channel.title: Events on NRRWA
channel.description: Recent content in Events on NRRWA

item.title: Rajyotsava Celebrations 2025
item.description: Every year, we celebrate Kannada Rajyotsava! This year, we have many cultural activities and competitions culminating with the main event on 23rd.

item.title: Family Day Celebration 2025
item.description: Join us for a fun-filled Family Day with games, activities, and entertainment for all ages!

item.title: Annual Cultural Festival 2024
item.description: Join us for our grand annual cultural festival featuring music, dance, and traditional performances!

item.title: Tree Planting Drive 2025
item.description: Join us for our annual tree planting drive to make our community greener and contribute to environmental conservation!
